name: Hidden Object - Summer Garden
description:
Try our latest addictive Hidden Object game today! Make some time for a sunny stroll among beautiful vegetation!

Summer Garden features scenes full of fantastic flora and artfully hidden items.

Three different modes of play:
NORMAL Mode - Timed, limited hints and exciting bonus rounds.
CASUAL Mode - A nice and relaxing experience.
CHALLENGE Mode - An extra challenge for those willing to accept it!

Four ways to find items:
Find by PICTURE - discover the items with a list of pictures.
Find by SILHOUETTE - find the items using only their silhouettes.
Find by WORD - a list of words is what you get to find each item in the scene.
Find by RANDOM - A random selection of the above modes for an extra challenge!

Also download and play up to 8 additional Hidden Object games for free in this game!

Images are in beautiful HD with a zoom feature. A training mode and hints are also included. Play fun Match3 and Memory mini games, collect Daily Rewards, and choose between Campaign and Free Play modes. Explore the beautiful images in 3D by tilting your device, plus lots more!

Have some fun in the (virtual) summer sun!
